CustomField.formula: IF( OR ( ISBLANK( Annual_Insurance_Deductible__c ), ISBLANK( Monthly_out_of_pocket_health_Care_Costs__c ) ),'', IF( OR( (Monthly_out_of_pocket_health_Care_Costs__c*12)> (Annual_Household_Income__pc*0.1), (Monthly_out_of_pocket_health_Care_Costs__c*12)> (2*Federal_Bracket__c), Annual_Insurance_Deductible__c > (Annual_Household_Income__pc*0.05) ), 'Underinsured', 'Not Underinsured' ) )
CustomField.label: Health Care Status
